Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Evergreen \Ev"er*green\a. (Bot.) Remaining unwithered through the winter, or retaining unwithered leaves until the leaves of the next year are expanded, as pines cedars, hemlocks, and the like. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Evergreen \Ev"er*green\, n. 1. (Bot.) An evergreen plant. [1913 Webster]
2. pl. Twigs and branches of evergreen plants used for decoration. ``The funeral evengreens entwine.'' --Keble.

evergreen adj : (of plants and shrubs) bearing foliage throughout the year [ant: {deciduous}] n : a plant having foliage that persists and remains green throughout the year [syn: {evergreen plant}] [ant: {deciduous plant}]
